page.title: 20Events.
page.content: I sat on the green iron seat by the Cross in Middleham. This is what I saw. A light blue mini_car drove past. Some horses trotted by, their hooves clattered on the road. A stable_lad walked past. He was carrying a saddle, reins and bridle. He was wearing jockey boots,jodhpurs and a crash helmet. A horse box reversed out of a gateway.The postman strolled by. The chimneys cast long shadows across the road.An old lady walked slowly up the hill. She had a scarf round her head. The dustbinmen arrived carrying dustbins and emptying them into the lorry.The Black Swan and The Black Bull pub signs swung in the breeze.A young woman pushed a baby past in a pram.A man and a woman held hands.I looked up at the Castle and then across to the telephone box in the corner by the Methodist Chapel.
